      • optionMenu

        public static java.lang.String optionMenu​(java.util.Set<java.lang.String> setOptions,
                                          java.lang.String menuName)
                                   throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        standard option menu with little to no customizability
        Parameters:
        setOptions - - arraylist of options which need to reflect to a
        menuName - - parameter to give the menu a name and help the user remember where they are linkedhashmap
        Returns:
        - string choice
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - - when user interrupts

      • optionMenuWithValue

        public static java.lang.String optionMenuWithValue​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,?> setOptions,
                                                   java.lang.String menuName)
                                            throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        print menu with options and set values
        Parameters:
        setOptions - - (linkedhash)map of options with name:value
        menuName - - desired menu name
        Returns:
        - name of selected option
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - - when user interrupts
